author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...IONA REMAINS A MAJOR HURRICANE SOUTH OF HAWAII...
summary: ...IONA REMAINS A MAJOR HURRICANE SOUTH OF HAWAII... As of 11:00 AM HST Tue Jul 29 the center of Iona was located near 10.9, -155.7 with movement W at 14 mph. The minimum central pressure was 957 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 125 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...IONA REMAINS A MAJOR HURRICANE SOUTH OF HAWAII... As of 11:00 AM HST Tue Jul 29 the center of Iona was located near 10.9, -155.7 with movement W at 14 mph. The minimum central pressure was 957 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 125 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Iona (CP1/CP012025)
